verses.verse: (A Psalm of Asaph.) <S%H389>Surely<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> To those <S%H1249>who<s%> are <S%H1249>pure<s%> in <S%H3824>heart!<s%>
But as for me, my <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H5186>came<s%> <S%H4592>close<s%> to <S%H5186>stumbling;<s%> My <S%H9036>steps<s%> had <S%H369>almost<s%> <S%H8210>slipped.<s%>
For I was <S%H7065>envious<s%> of the <S%H1984>arrogant,<s%> [As] I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H7965>prosperity<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
For <S%H369>there<s%> are <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2784>pains<s%> in their <S%H4194>death;<s%> And their <S%H9002>body<s%> is <S%H1277>fat.<s%>
They are not in <S%H5999>trouble<s%> [as other] <S%H582>men;<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> are they <S%H5060>plagued<s%> <S%H5973>like<s%> <S%H120>mankind.<s%>
<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H1346>pride<s%> is their <S%H6059>necklace;<s%> The <S%H7897>garment<s%> of <S%H2555>violence<s%> <S%H9400>covers<s%> them.
Their <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H3318>bulges<s%> from <S%H2459>fatness;<s%> The <S%H4906>imaginations<s%> of [their] <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H5674>run<s%> <S%H5674>riot.<s%>
They <S%H4167>mock,<s%> and <S%H9563>wickedly<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> of <S%H6233>oppression;<s%> They <S%H1696>speak<s%> from on <S%H4791>high.<s%>
They have <S%H7896>set<s%> their <S%H6310>mouth<s%> against the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> And their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1980>parades<s%> through the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H1988>this<s%> <S%H1988>place;<s%> And <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4392>abundance<s%> are <S%H4680>drunk<s%> by them.
And they <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H351>"How<s%> does <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%>? And is <S%H3426>there<s%> <S%H1844>knowledge<s%> with the <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High<s%>?"
<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H7563>wicked;<s%> And <S%H5769>always<s%> at <S%H7961>ease,<s%> they have <S%H7685>increased<s%> [in] <S%H2428>wealth.<s%>
<S%H389>Surely<s%> in <S%H7385>vain<s%> I have <S%H2135>kept<s%> my <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H2135>pure,<s%> And <S%H7364>washed<s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> in <S%H5356>innocence;<s%>
For I have been <S%H5060>stricken<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long, And <S%H9640>chastened<s%> every <S%H1242>morning.<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> I had <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H5608>speak<s%> <S%H3644>thus,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I should have <S%H898>betrayed<s%> the <S%H1755>generation<s%> of Thy <S%H1121>children.<s%>
When I <S%H2803>pondered<s%> to <S%H3045>understand<s%> <S%H384>this,<s%> It was <S%H5999>troublesome<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight<s%>
<S%H5704>Until<s%> I <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of <S%H410>God;<s%> [Then] I <S%H995>perceived<s%> their <S%H319>end.<s%>
<S%H389>Surely<s%> Thou dost <S%H7896>set<s%> them in <S%H9142>slippery<s%> <S%H9142>places;<s%> Thou dost <S%H5307>cast<s%> them <S%H5307>down<s%> to <S%H4376>destruction.<s%>
<S%H349>How<s%> they are <S%H8047>destroyed<s%> in a <S%H7281>moment!<s%> They are <S%H8552>utterly<s%> <S%H5486>swept<s%> <S%H5486>away<s%> by <S%H1091>sudden<s%> <S%H1091>terrors!<s%>
Like a <S%H2472>dream<s%> <S%H4480>when<s%> one <S%H9516>awakes,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> when <S%H5782>aroused,<s%> Thou wilt <S%H959>despise<s%> their <S%H6754>form.<s%>
<S%H3588>When<s%> my <S%H3824>heart<s%> was <S%H2556>embittered,<s%> And I was <S%H8150>pierced<s%> <S%H3629>within,<s%>
Then I was <S%H1198>senseless<s%> and <S%H3808>ignorant<s%><S%H3045>;<s%> I was [like] a <S%H929>beast<s%> <S%H5973>before<s%> Thee.
Nevertheless I am <S%H8548>continually<s%> with Thee; Thou hast <S%H270>taken<s%> <S%H270>hold<s%> of my <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
With Thy <S%H6098>counsel<s%> Thou wilt <S%H5148>guide<s%> me, And <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3947>receive<s%> me to <S%H9202>glory.<s%>
<S%H4310>Whom<s%> have I in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> [but Thee]? And <S%H5973>besides<s%> Thee, I <S%H2654>desire<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> on <S%H776>earth.<s%>
My <S%H7607>flesh<s%> and my <S%H3824>heart<s%> may <S%H3615>fail,<s%> But <S%H430>God<s%> is the <S%H6697>strength<s%> of my <S%H3824>heart<s%> and my <S%H2506>portion<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
For, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> those <S%H7369>who<s%> are <S%H7369>far<s%> from Thee will perish; Thou hast <S%H6>destroyed<s%> <S%H6789>all<s%> those who are <S%H3605>unfaithful<s%> to Thee.

But as for me, the <S%H7132>nearness<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> is my <S%H2896>good;<s%> I have <S%H7896>made<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> my <S%H4268>refuge,<s%> That I may <S%H5608>tell<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> Thy <S%H4399>works.<s%>
